name: .UDK File Extension
summary: Learn about .UDK files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Game map design created by the Unreal Engine Development Kit (UDK), a popular free game engine developed by Epic Games; saves the layout, 3D objects, and textures used for a game map; used for creating the 3D worlds that games are played in.

content: UDK files can also contain locations of ambient sounds as well as pathing for artificial intelligence players.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
